app_detail:
Guess the Pokemon Quiz is a free game developed in Unity, that will challenge all your knowledge about the great world of PokÃ©mon. If you think you know a lot about this fantastic world, download it now and exceed each level.

Guess the Pokemon Quiz in its first version, has the first two generations in a great design:

ğŸ’ First generation Kanto
ğŸ’ Second generation Johto

To win each level you just have to guess each PokÃ©mon that will appear on your cell phone screen.

If you can not guess the PokÃ©mon in the image, do not worry!
ğŸ† For each correct answer, you will earn points.
ğŸ† Points can be exchanged for clues that will help you overcome each challenge.
ğŸ† You can also watch video ads to earn points.
ğŸ† Guess each one of them.

Soon the next generations will be included and so on until the last one. So in Guess the Pokemon Quiz we will have all the Pokemon existing to date.

More than 19 levels with more than 386 PokÃ©mon!

Further levels will be included to meet the Gym Leaders of all generations!

DOWNLOAD THIS FREE GAME

Guess the Pokemon Quiz and show that you are a true PokÃ©mon Master and gotta catch 'em all!!
